sentence.Network_en: This trip was not like his first triumphant return home in 1990.
sentence.Network_cn: 这趟行程不同于他1990年的首次衣锦还乡。

sentence.Network_en: Duncan and his triumphant soldiers celebrate their military victory.
sentence.Network_cn: 邓肯和他那些欢欣鼓舞的士兵们庆祝他们取得了军事胜利。
上校的声音听上去万分得意。

司马得四六级英语词汇大全(经典珍藏版) - 豆丁网 ... triumph n.vi. 胜利 triumphant a. 胜利的，得意洋洋的 victorious a. 胜利的.

《Friends》... ... thrice adv. 三次 triumphant adj. 胜利的, 成功的, 狂欢的, 洋洋得意的 admitted adj. 被承认的, 被确认无疑的.

list.abs: 凯的意思_百度知道 ... 2. 凯撒大帝[ Gaius Julius Caesar] 3. 凯旋[ triumphant return] 4. 凯旋门[ triumphal arch].

means.word_mean: 胜利的,领先的,不可征服的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'victorious'): from Old French, or from Latin triumphant- 'celebrating a triumph', from the verb triumphare (see triumph)

entry.tran: (成功或获胜后)欢欣鼓舞的，狂喜的
entry.def: Someone who is triumphant has gained a victory or succeeded in something and feels very happy about it.

example.ex: Duncan and his triumphant soldiers celebrate their military victory…
example.tran: 邓肯和他那些欢欣鼓舞的士兵们庆祝他们取得了军事胜利。
上校的声音听上去万分得意。

means.word_mean: 1. joyful and proud especially because of triumph or success;

sentences.sentence: "rejoicing crowds filled the streets on VJ Day"

auth_sentence.content: So far her homecoming has been less than triumphant.
auth_sentence.res_content: So far her homecoming has been less than triumphant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So far her homecoming has been less than triumphant.

auth_sentence.content: Her biggest anthems usually have her least triumphant lyrics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her biggest anthems usually have her least triumphant lyrics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her biggest anthems usually have her least triumphant lyrics.

auth_sentence.content: She could be the poster child for triumphant transgression.
auth_sentence.res_content: She could be the poster child for triumphant transgression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She could be the poster child for triumphant transgression.

sentences.cn: 我们向获胜的队伍喝彩。

sentences.en: The victorious general made a triumphant return.
The army made a triumphant entry into the enemy’s capital.
sentences.cn: 部队胜利地进入敌方首都。

sentences.en: Hers is a moving and ultimately triumphant story.
sentences.cn: 她的事迹是一个感人肺腑的、最终获得成功的故事。

means.word_mean: (因胜利而)喜气洋洋的, 欢欣鼓舞的

sentences.en: A triumphant smile appeared on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上露出了胜利的微笑。

sentences.en: The losers didn’t like our triumphant laughter.
sentences.cn: 失败的那些人不喜欢听到我们得意的笑声。

sentences.en: There was a positively triumphant note in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她的声音里带有一种极为得意的语气。
